name: Bourbon Chicken
instructions: Brown chicken, 5 min on each side to get some color on the chicken.
Combine all remaining ingredients in a bowl and whisk together.
Add sauce to pan with chicken and bring to a simmer.
Cook chicken in sauce for 20-25 minutes or until fully cooked.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

name: Taco Soup
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed
instructions: Brown beef and onion together in a large pot.
Add all remaining ingredients to pot and stir together.
Simmer for 30-40 minutes.
Serve hot with toppings of your choice.

name: Roast Beef
instructions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F.
Rub beef with olive oil and seasonings.
Place beef in a roasting pan and roast in oven for 1 1/2 - 2 hours, or until desired doneness is achieved.
Let rest for 10-15 minutes before slicing and serving.

name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, toast pine nuts until lightly browned.
In a large bowl, mix together pesto, parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Add cooked pasta and pine nuts to the bowl and mix well.
Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: Preheat oven to 350F.
Mix ground beef, breadcrumbs, milk, parmesan cheese, egg, parsley, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Form the mixture into meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake meatballs for 20-25 minutes, or until fully cooked.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat tomato sauce in a saucepan.
Add meatballs to the sauce and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Serve spaghetti with meatballs and sauce on top.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cut beef into thin strips.
Mix flour, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Coat beef strips in the flour mixture.
Heat olive oil in a skillet.
Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Remove beef from the skillet.
Add onion and mushrooms to the skillet and cook until softened.
Add red wine to the skillet and stir to scrape up browned bits.
Add beef broth to the skillet and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens.
Stir in sour cream and return beef to the skillet.
